about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Committed to a sustainable future through quality recycling
about.description: At TRICYCLE PRODUCTOS SL, we are dedicated to giving waste a second life, transforming it into valuable resources. Our mission is to contribute to a more sustainable future through effective recycling of plastics, metals, and papers.
about.additionalInfo: With years of experience in the sector, we have become leaders in the transformation and commercialization of recyclable materials, always maintaining the highest standards of quality and environmental commitment.
about.visionText: To be leaders in innovative recycling solutions that transform waste management into sustainable opportunities for our communities and the planet.
about.missionText: To transform waste into valuable resources, promoting the circular economy and minimizing environmental impact.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Innovation, quality, and commitment in every process
whyChooseUs.qualityText: Our recycling processes meet the highest international standards of quality and efficiency.
whyChooseUs.innovationText: We develop and implement advanced technologies to continuously improve our recycling processes.
whyChooseUs.customerServiceText: We offer personalized service, tailored to the specific needs of each client.
whyChooseUs.sustainabilityText: Our solutions are designed to minimize environmental impact and promote a more sustainable future.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: From waste to resources in four simple steps
process.step1Text: We collect recyclable materials from companies, institutions, and community collection points.
process.step2Text: We separate materials by type and quality to ensure efficient recycling.
process.step3Text: We transform materials into new raw materials using advanced technology.
process.step4Text: We distribute recycled materials to manufacturers and companies committed to sustainability.
process.step5Text: We provide detailed reports on the positive environmental impact generated.

plastico.title: Recycled Plastic
plastico.description: We offer different types of high-quality recycled plastics for various industrial applications. Our process guarantees the purity and consistency of the material.
plastico.longDescription: At TRICYCLE we specialize in recycling different types of plastics, transforming them into high-quality raw material ready for use in new products. We work with PP, HDPE, PET, ABS, PA, PS, ABS, ensuring maximum purity and consistency in each batch.
